snippet: Under a government initiative, each week a different citizen is entrusted the country’s Twitter account, @Sweden, to post at will.
abstract: Trollhattan Journal; Swedish government initiative entrusts the country's Twitter account to a new citizen each week to post at will; the program, known as Curators of Sweden, came about when the government tourist agency sought to develop a plan to present the country to the world on Twitter; it has inspired similar projects in other places.
lead_paragraph: Under a government initiative, each week a different citizen is entrusted the country’s Twitter account, @Sweden, to post at will.

headline.seo: Many Voices of Sweden, via Twitter
headline.main: Swedes’ Twitter Voice: Anyone, Saying (Blush) Almost Anything
headline.print_headline: Swedes’ Twitter Voice: Anyone, Saying (Blush) Almost Anything
